upakaraka panthi thahanam. 2015 a.po.sa (sa/pela) wibhagaya desambar masa 08 wani angaharuwada dina aarambha kara desambar masa 17 wani brahaspathinda dinen awasan weyi. a.po.sa. (sa/pela) wibhagayata adalawa 2015.12.02 dina madhyama rathri 12.00 sita wibhagaya awasan wana 2015.12.17 wani dina dakwa sampurna kalaya thula ema wibhaga apekshakayan sandaha upakaraka panthi sanwidhanaya kirima, ema panthi meheyawima, wishayanubaddha deshana, sammanthrana, wadamulu pawathwima, ema wibhaga sandaha anumana prashna athulath prashna pathra mudranaya kirima, eewa bedaharima, wibhaga prashna pathrawala prashna labadena bawata ho ee ha samana prashna labadena bawata postar, banar, athpathrika widyuth ho mudritha madhya magin prasiddha kirima ho ewani da langa thaba ganima sapura thahanam bawa wibhaga komasaris janaral dabliw.em.en.je. pushpakumara mahatha kiyayi.
